content.en: HDD servo optimization: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to optimize the performance of hard disk drive (HDD) servo systems. These algorithms aim to minimize settling time, improve system performance, and reduce vibrations in seeking trajectories. They use techniques such as genetic algorithms, sliding mode control, mixed-objective optimization, and adaptive filtering to achieve these goals. The proposed algorithms enhance the control and tracking capabilities of HDD servo systems, leading to faster and more efficient data storage and retrieval.
content.da: HDD-servooptimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere ydeevnen af harddiskdrev (HDD) servosystemer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at minimere indstillingstiden, forbedre systemets ydeevne og reducere vibrationer i søgerbaner. De anvender teknikker såsom genetiske algoritmer, glidende modkontrol, blandet-målsætning optimering og adaptiv filtrering for at opnå disse mål. De foreslåede algoritmer forbedrer kontrol- og sporingskapaciteterne af HDD-servo systemer, hvilket fører til hurtigere og mere effektiv dataopbevaring og -hentning.
